title: Biden Says He Is Vetting Four People for Supreme Court Vacancy
sub_head: ‘I’m not looking to make an ideological choice,’ the president said of his pick to succeed Justice Stephen Breyer
body:
President Biden said he is vetting four candidates for his coming Supreme Court nomination to succeed retiring Justice Stephen Breyer.
“I’ve taken about four people and done the deep dive on them,” Mr. Biden told NBC’s Lester Holt in an interview, excerpts of which were released by the network on Thursday. He said his administration was conducting background checks to “see if there’s anything in the background that would make them not qualified.”
